EmailTemplate.name: LFCCP Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're registered!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're registered!
{!CampaignMember.FirstName}, you have successfully registered for {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} with the Imagine Institute. All eligible participants will receive free STARS hours and {!CampaignMember.Training_Incentive__c} in a cash incentive upon completion of the training. Details are below!
When: {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_End_DateTime__c} Where: {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__C501_Training_Location_Text__c}
{!CampaignMember.Group_Classes__c}
Food Provided: {!CampaignMember.Meal_Provided__c}
Please let us know if you won't be able to make it so we can let another provider take the class.
Please allow up to 90 business days starting the following month of training for cash incentive.
If you earne $600 or more in cash incentives through the Imagine Institute in a calendar year, January 1, 2020 – December 31, 2020, it is subject to taxes and we need to collect a W-9 form from you BEFORE we can process your payment.
Please fill out the W-9 form, click here, sign it and return to training@imaginewa.org.
Call us at 206-492-5249 or email training@imaginewa.org.
See you soon!
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
¡Está registrado!
{!CampaignMember.FirstName}, está registrado para {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} con el Instituto Imagine. Todos los participantes eligibles recibirán horas de STARS gratis y un incentivo de {!CampaignMember.Training_Incentive__c} en incentivos monetarios al completar la capacitación..
Cuando:
{!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_End_DateTime__c}
Dirección:
{!CampaignMember.c501_cm__C501_Training_Location_Text__c}
Comida será servida: {!CampaignMember.Meal_Provided__c}
Si no puede asistir, favor de avisarnos tan pronto como posible.
Espere hasta 90 días hábiles a partir del siguiente mes de capacitación para recibir incentivos en efectivo.
Si gana $ 600 o más en incentivos en efectivo a través del Imagine Institute en un año calendario, del 1 de enero de 2020 al 31 de diciembre de 2020, está sujeto a impuestos y debemos cobrarle un formulario W-9 ANTES de que podamos procesar su pago.
Complete el formulario W-9, haga clic aquí, fírmelo y regrese a training@imaginewa.org.
¿Preguntas? Contáctenos al 206-492-5249 o training@imaginewa.org.
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
